member.name: WS_FAULT_DISCLOSURE
member.summary: Controls how much error information is included in a fault. Since the error object may contain sensitive data as part of the error string, it is not always appropriate to include the error strings information in all faults.

member.name: WS_FAULT_DISCLOSURE.WS_MINIMAL_FAULT_DISCLOSURE
member.summary: Use a generic fault string for all errors.

member.name: WS_FAULT_DISCLOSURE.WS_FULL_FAULT_DISCLOSURE
member.summary: Use the error string as the fault string.
